workflow.name: Make UGC ads from app screen recordings with Gemini, Sora 2, and VideoBGRemover
workflow.description:
## Who's it for

This workflow is perfect for app developers, SaaS founders, and mobile growth teams who need constant UGC-style video ads without hiring creators or agencies. If you're spending $500+ per creator and waiting weeks for videos, this automates the entire process for $2-5 per video in 8 minutes.

## How it works

Upload an app screen recording, and this n8n workflow handles everything: Gemini AI analyzes the recording and generates a UGC ad structure (hook, problem, solution, CTA with word limits). It describes the ideal actor, emotional journey, and visual style. Sora 2 then generates a hyper-realistic AI actor delivering the script naturally. VideoBGRemover removes the actor's background and composites them picture-in-picture over your screen recording with audio mixing. The result is a scroll-stopping UGC ad ready for TikTok, Instagram, and Facebook.

## Set up steps

Setup takes ~10 minutes and requires 3 API keys:

1. Get your **Gemini API key** from Google AI Studio
2. Get your **FAL AI key** for Sora 2 access
3. Get your **VideoBGRemover API key** at https://videobgremover.com/n8n
4. Add all three keys to n8n environment variables
5. Connect Google Drive for output storage
6. Test with the included sample screen recording

The workflow includes 7 detailed sticky notes explaining each section (Gemini analysis, Sora generation, VideoBGRemover composition, output handling).

## Requirements

- Google Gemini API key (for video analysis)
- FAL AI API key (for Sora 2 access)
- VideoBGRemover API key
- Google Drive account (for final video storage)
- App screen recordings in vertical format (9:16 recommended, 4-12 seconds)

## How to customize

Modify the Gemini prompt to adjust ad tone, script word limits, or actor descriptions. Change composition settings in the VideoBGRemover node (position, size, audio mix). Add your own post-processing nodes for branding, captions, or multi-platform exports.

parameters.content:
## üé¨ AI UGC Ad Generator

**What it does:**
- Analyzes app screen recording with Gemini AI
- Generates UGC ad structure (hook, problem, solution, CTA)
- Creates AI actor video with Sora 2
- Removes background from actor
- Composites actor over screen recording
- Saves final UGC ad to Google Drive

**Perfect for:**
- App developers creating UGC-style ads
- SaaS products with screen demos
- Mobile app marketing teams
- Digital product launches
- Feature announcement videos

**Processing time:** 5-8 minutes total
- Gemini analysis: ~30s
- Sora 2 generation: ~2-4 min
- Background removal + composition: ~2-3 min

**Setup:** ~10 minutes (3 API keys)

[üìñ Full Documentation](https://docs.videobgremover.com/)

## üîë API Keys Setup (Required)

**1. Gemini API Key**
- Visit: https://aistudio.google.com/apikey
- Create new API key
- Add to n8n: Settings ‚Üí Variables
  - Name: `GEMINI_KEY`
  - Value: your Gemini API key

**2. FAL AI Key (for Sora 2)**
- Visit: https://fal.ai/dashboard/keys
- Sign up and create API key
- Add to n8n: Settings ‚Üí Variables
  - Name: `FAL_KEY`
  - Value: your FAL key

**3. VideoBGRemover API Key**
- Visit: https://videobgremover.com/api-management
- Sign up (free tier available)
- Add to n8n: Settings ‚Üí Variables
  - Name: `VIDEOBGREMOVER_KEY`
  - Value: your API key

‚úÖ All keys use `$vars.` (secure)

## üì• Input Required

**screenshot_video_url** (required)
- URL to your app screen recording
- Should be vertical (9:16 aspect ratio)
- Duration: 4-12 seconds recommended
- Must be publicly accessible

**meta** (optional)
- `product_name`: Name of app/feature
- `benefits`: Array of key benefits
- `tone`: Desired ad tone (friendly, professional, etc.)

**Example:**
```json
{
  "screenshot_video_url": "https://...",
  "meta": {
    "product_name": "MyApp Pro",
    "benefits": ["Fast", "Easy", "Powerful"],
    "tone": "friendly"
  },
  "store_to_drive": true
}
```

## üîÑ Workflow Steps

**1. Gemini Analysis** (~30s)
- Uploads screen recording to Gemini
- AI analyzes app/feature shown
- Generates UGC ad structure:
  - `ad_topic`: What's being promoted
  - `hook`: Attention grabber (5-8 words)
  - `problem`: Pain point (12-15 words)
  - `solution`: Fix presented (12-15 words)
  - `cta`: Call-to-action (5-8 words)
  - `visual_details`: Actor description
  - `emotional_journey`: Emotion flow

**2. Sora 2 Generation** (~2-4 min)
- Creates AI actor video
- Natural UGC-style delivery
- Matches emotional journey
- 4, 8, or 12 second duration

**3. VBR Composition** (~2-3 min)
- Removes actor background
- Composites over screen recording
- Bottom-right corner positioning
- Audio mixing (30% bg + 100% fg)

## üéØ Sora Prompt Structure

**Template:**
[ICP/visual details] filming a UGC ad about [APP CONTEXT].
They start by saying: [hook],
then explain: [problem],
present the solution: [solution],
and end with: [CTA].
[Emotional journey]. [Camera style].
Natural hand gestures and expressions.

**Key Elements:**
- `ad_topic`: What app/feature is being promoted
- `visual_details`: Actor description + setting
- `ad_structure`: Hook, problem, solution, CTA
- `emotional_journey`: How emotions progress
- Camera style extracted from visual_details

‚úÖ This structure makes Sora understand CONTEXT vs WHAT TO GENERATE

## üíæ Google Drive Setup

**Step 1:** Connect Google Drive
- Click "Upload to Google Drive" node
- Click "Connect"
- Authorize n8n

**Step 2:** Choose folder (optional)
- Default: Root of "My Drive"
- Or select specific folder

**Output:**
- Permanent shareable link
- Direct download URL
- File metadata
- Drive file ID

‚è±Ô∏è Setup time: ~2 minutes

**Note:** Files are named automatically:
`ugc_final_[timestamp].mp4`

## üöÄ How to Use

**Manual testing:**
1. Update `screenshot_video_url` in "Sample Input"
2. Optionally update `meta` object
3. Click "Execute Workflow"
4. Wait 5-8 minutes for processing
5. Check Google Drive for final video

**Webhook automation:**
1. Activate workflow
2. Copy webhook URL
3. POST to webhook:
```json
{
  "screenshot_video_url": "https://...",
  "meta": {
    "product_name": "MyApp",
    "benefits": ["Fast", "Easy"],
    "tone": "friendly"
  },
  "store_to_drive": true
}
```

**Tips:**
- Use 9:16 vertical videos
- Keep recordings 4-12 seconds
- Test with sample video first

## ü§ñ GEMINI AI ANALYSIS SECTION
Analyzes screen recording ‚Üí Generates ad structure (hook, problem, solution, CTA, actor details)

## üé® SORA 2 AI VIDEO GENERATION SECTION
Generates AI actor video based on Gemini's plan ‚Üí UGC-style talking head video

## üé¨ VIDEOBGREMOVER COMPOSITION SECTION
Removes AI actor background ‚Üí Composites over screen recording ‚Üí Mixes audio

## üíæ OUTPUT SECTION
Download final video ‚Üí Upload to Google Drive ‚Üí Return response

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
